headline: Assurant Launches F&I On Demand™, a Full-Service, Virtual Resource for Auto Dealerships Facing Staffing and Resource Challenges
summary: ATLANTA, January 27, 2026--Assurant, Inc. (NYSE: AIZ), a premier global protection company that safeguards and services connected devices, homes, and automobiles in partnership with the world’s leading brands, today announced the launch of F&I On Demand™, a virtual staffing solution designed to help auto dealerships address personnel shortages in finance and insurance (F&I) departments.
